html:
6.2.17  8:50 pm   Hey Bill, the question at 6.1.17 11:59 am (why no Tuesday videos yet) is referring to your answer to a question at 5.26.17 1:46 pm, where you replied "i'm hoping to have [the videos] done every tuesday, for a very long time". Did you mean something different when you said that? (BTW this isn't the same person, I'm just curious about it as well)

     that is an accurate quote, except for the part in brackets. you added that

6.2.17  8:16 pm   do you have tips on being alone for long periods of time?

     develop your special powers! you will still be lonely but at least you'll have powers

6.2.17  8:16 pm   How are you able to maintain such genuinity in your content despite the pressures of your audiences and other extrinsic factors?

     someone's gotta do it

6.2.17  8:12 pm   Have you ever been to New Canaan, CT?

     yes

6.2.17  8:05 pm   may I be your apprentice?

     sure
6.2.17  6:35 pm   Which type of video do you prefer making: the history videos like hotwig and the history of japan video or the random shorter videos?

6.2.17  5:57 pm   Early on, your video ideas were kinda algorithmically generated.

     they were not, but i respect your opinion

     In light of the success of this process, would you use sex dice?

     i don't know what they do

6.2.17  5:20 pm   http://prntscr.com/ff8fnh Explain. Now.

     i explained how i prefer to use capital letters, while simultaneously using one in the exact way that i explained. and someone apparently thought that was a cause for alarm, i suppose

6.2.17  4:49 pm   is it necessary to write the beginning of a sentence with a lowercase letter to be weird

     that's not very weird

6.2.17  4:18 pm   How now is soon?

     almost

6.2.17  3:36 pm   Hi I was wondering if you ever got out of song prison?

     i finally just got in

6.2.17  1:51 pm   if you had to guess, what % of questions do you actually answer?

     maybe 10%

6.2.17  11:29 am   Bill, are we living in a computer simulation?

     of what

6.2.17  11:26 am   when is the thing planned to come out?

     which thing

6.2.17  10:28 am   I get why you sleep the way you do,

     how do you know how i sleep

     but having a regular sleep schedule (as in, waking up around the same time every day, even better if it's by the sun) is very good for your health and happiness. good shit man

     what makes you think i don't have one already

6.2.17  9:47 am   help i forgot how to capatalize letters?

     hold shift while typing a letter. or if you want them all to be capital, press caps lock

6.2.17  9:44 am   what do you sexually identify as?

     a person

6.2.17  9:27 am   How about with asking a question you could enter a "name" that is displayed next to the question. That way you could just ctrl+f the name you entered and find your question Kleopatra

     that's a reasonable idea but that's more complicated than i want this page to be

6.2.17  9:04 am   What is the name of your next thing?

     i love you
6.2.17  8:58 am   Is this statement false?
6.2.17  8:51 am   what is your favorite film?

6.2.17  8:02 am   Everyone knows what the internet is. Thoughts?

     some people might not
6.2.17  7:34 am   what's your favorite thing to drink?
6.2.17  6:17 am   What's your daily routine?

6.2.17  6:16 am   Be as vague as you want but what is this new video about?

     what video

6.2.17  5:29 am   how did you now you could smoke weed in california when it wasnt even legal there (for recreational use) in 2011? or is it bc u can technically smoke weed anywhere? or did u edit the lyrics later?

     back at that time, california was known to be one of the most forward leaning states on marijuana laws. i think it was only medical by then, but they were one of the first. they were also known to be one of the most forward leaning on gay marriage, which is why the last line of the song got thrown in as well. as for the other states mentioned, there is no truth there whatsoever. alabama was known at the time to have some of the strictest marijuana laws of any state, perhaps still. the remainder of the states were chosen based on the fact that they are 3 syllables and sounded right in the song. over the years since the song was written, legalization of both marijuana and gay marriage have been sweeping the nation, and each time i think to myself 'oh no, i guess that california song probably won't make sense anymore.' but it was never entirely factual to begin with, so the additional inaccuracies make for a nice twist

6.2.17  3:52 am   Vine is gone now Did you feel as if you were ready to move on from it when it closed?

     i already moved on from it 1 year earlier, when i quit my 7 day vine schedule in order to have more time to finish history of japan
6.2.17  1:54 am   pls give me a random color

6.2.17  1:44 am   I'd like to go about becoming your apprentice, if you would like to figure the process out together?

     sure

6.2.17  1:35 am   What happened to your previous apprentice?

     i never had one

6.2.17  1:34 am   how to stop caring about things?

     why do you care to not care about what you care about
6.1.17  11:21 pm   do you think you'll collab with anyone else on youtube?

6.1.17  11:21 pm   will in california have a video to go with it?

     no

6.1.17  11:17 pm   Are you already working on the next thing?

     oh hell yeah
6.1.17  10:38 pm   how soon is now

6.1.17  10:34 pm   how to create a spicy melody?

     you have to just make it up
6.1.17  9:28 pm   what do you look like?
6.1.17  9:22 pm   How long did it take it make the history of the entire world i guess?

6.1.17  8:57 pm   What did you eat for your afternoon snack in new canaan?

     songwriting

6.1.17  8:39 pm   what do i do

     anything

6.1.17  7:35 pm   how do i come out as gay to my parents?

     i'm not sure if it really matters. they will surely find out what gender your relationship partner(s) are when they meet them

6.1.17  7:19 pm   Do you still enjoy making content as much as you did in the beginning?

     yes, much more now, because i'm getting to the really good stuff
6.1.17  7:02 pm   how much time you worked on the history of the world video?

6.1.17  6:52 pm   how do I become friends with you bill?

     stealth tactics

6.1.17  6:51 pm   Have you actually been to Alabama? You said you have, but I don't know if that's in the "I actually went to New Canaan" way or not.

     i have been there but that has nothing to do with the song. also the song was written before i had ever been there
6.1.17  6:47 pm   how do i find friends?

6.1.17  6:32 pm   Superb vids. But why not render 60 fps?

     i don't need anything to make the process take longer

6.1.17  5:29 pm   how do you think may 2017 went?

     may 2017 was a powerful turning point for me. i finished history of the entire world after 11 ridiculous months of non-stop work, and finally turned my full attention to one of my most important life long projects which has been expanding out of control since way before i did videos, and constantly has been pushed aside and kicked down the road for the past couple years, due to videos

6.1.17  4:15 pm   What is the best thing since sliced bread?

     water purification

6.1.17  3:42 pm   can you write without capitals?

     yes, but it is nice to use them sometimes
